attributes.action: Make Boxing Day 2020 ONLINE ONLY! Give all retail workers some #RetailRelief
attributes.additional_details: By making BOXING DAY ONLINE ONLY... you’ll still be supporting initial retail SALES! And people will still hit the high streets ....but just one day later.
attributes.background:
After an extremely tough year for retail workers , give them the chance to spend 2 days over Christmas with what little family they can. 
Make BOXING DAY....ONLINE ONLY and give retail workers some much needed #RetailRelief

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324610
